original_title: ...و من در خوشبختی شیرین به دنیا آمدم!
overview: At four o'clock early in the morning a strange voice talks on an answering machine and announces a surprise, a cardboard box is at the front door, "filled with voices and pictures of another time and place". This time is November 1977, two years before the revolution in Iran. The experimental short film in Beckett style jumps from one time zone to another.
title: ...and I Was Born to Sweet Delight!
